faq.title: What is multimodal annotation?
faq.desc: Multimodal annotation is the process of synchronizing and labeling multiple data types—such as images, video, text, audio, and sensor logs—into unified datasets that enable context-aware AI and Generative AI models.

faq.title: Why is multimodal annotation critical for Generative AI?
faq.desc: Accurate alignment between vision, language, and audio prevents model hallucinations and enables Generative AI systems to understand context and produce reliable, multi-sensory outputs.

faq.title: How do you handle audio-video synchronization?
faq.desc: Audio timestamps are precisely aligned with video frames and transcripts to ensure temporal consistency and accurate event recognition throughout the media file.

faq.title: Do you support sensor fusion and LiDAR annotation?
faq.desc: Yes. We calibrate 2D camera imagery with 3D LiDAR point clouds to enable accurate depth perception and object recognition for autonomous and advanced perception systems.

faq.title: Is my multimodal data secure?
faq.desc: Yes. All multimodal annotation operations comply with ISO/IEC 27001:2022 and GDPR standards, using secure environments, controlled access, and strict data governance protocols.

faq.title: Do I need to provide annotation tools?
faq.desc: No. We are tool-agnostic and integrate seamlessly with proprietary platforms or third-party tools such as Labelbox without disrupting existing workflows.

faq.title: How do you ensure multimodal annotation accuracy?
faq.desc: Accuracy is ensured through Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) validation, cross-modal consistency checks, and reviewer oversight to verify correct alignment across all data types.

faq.title: Do you offer RLHF for multimodal models?
faq.desc: Yes. We provide Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) services to evaluate and rank multimodal model outputs, improving safety, performance, and alignment with human intent.

faq.title: Can you annotate medical and regulated data?
faq.desc: Yes. We support annotation of regulated datasets, including DICOM medical images linked with clinical text and reports, using secure healthcare workflows and PII anonymization.

faq.title: How quickly can you scale multimodal annotation teams?
faq.desc: We begin with a pilot team to validate annotation guidelines and then rapidly scale our managed workforce to support high-volume multimodal datasets efficiently.

faq.title: What is text annotation in AI?
faq.desc: Text annotation is the process of labeling text data with metadata tags so natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning models can accurately understand language, context, intent, and relationships.

faq.title: How do you ensure text annotation accuracy?
faq.desc: Accuracy is ensured through multi-tier quality assurance, including rigorous annotator training, automated validation scripts, senior reviewer oversight, and high Inter-Annotator Agreement (IAA) benchmarks.

faq.title: Can you handle complex or domain-specific text?
faq.desc: Yes. We assign Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) for legal, medical, financial, and technical text annotation to ensure domain accuracy and deep contextual understanding.

faq.title: How is sensitive text data secured?
faq.desc: Text data is processed in environments aligned with ISO/IEC 27001:2022 and GDPR compliance, using secure VPN access, restricted workstations, controlled permissions, and NDA-bound teams.

faq.title: Do you provide text annotation tools?
faq.desc: We are tool-agnostic and can operate within your proprietary platforms or recommend and manage leading third-party text annotation tools as required.

faq.title: How quickly can text annotation teams scale?
faq.desc: Pilot annotation teams can be launched within days, with full-scale expansion typically achieved within weeks depending on dataset complexity and volume.

faq.title: Do you support multilingual text annotation?
faq.desc: Yes. We provide multilingual text annotation services using native-language specialists to ensure linguistic accuracy, cultural relevance, and contextual correctness.

faq.title: What pricing models do you offer for text annotation?
faq.desc: We offer flexible pricing models, including dedicated managed teams and transaction-based pricing, customized based on dataset size, complexity, and project duration.

faq.title: What is video annotation?
faq.desc: Video annotation is the process of labeling objects, actions, events, and timestamps within video data to create high-quality ground truth datasets used to train computer vision and AI models.

faq.title: How does video annotation differ from image annotation?
faq.desc: Video annotation requires temporal consistency, meaning objects must be tracked and retain their identity across multiple frames, whereas image annotation treats each frame as an independent, static instance.

faq.title: Can you work with our existing video annotation tools?
faq.desc: Yes. We are tool-agnostic and integrate seamlessly with proprietary platforms or third-party video annotation tools such as CVAT, Labelbox, and V7 without disrupting existing workflows.

faq.title: How do you ensure video annotation accuracy?
faq.desc: Accuracy is ensured through a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) approach, standardized annotation guidelines, calibration phases, and multi-tier quality assurance with senior reviewer validation.

faq.title: Is video data kept secure during annotation?
faq.desc: Yes. All video annotation operations comply with ISO/IEC 27001:2022 and GDPR standards, using secure access controls, air-gapped environments for sensitive data, and strict confidentiality agreements.

faq.title: Can you scale video annotation teams quickly?
faq.desc: Yes. Pilot teams can be launched rapidly, and our managed workforce model allows fast scaling to support high-volume and long-duration video annotation projects.

faq.title: Can you handle complex video labeling tasks?
faq.desc: Yes. We conduct calibration and alignment phases to define edge cases, temporal rules, and subjective labeling criteria before transitioning to full-scale production.

faq.title: What video formats do you support?
faq.desc: We support all standard video formats such as MP4, AVI, and MOV, as well as specialized formats including medical DICOM videos, industrial footage, and surveillance video streams.
